warp_5=`

warp_11=`

warp_15=`ret.xy = rsamp.xy;

warp_17=`

warp_23=`ret.z = tex2D(sampler_fw_main,ret.xy).z;

warp_26=`

warp_28=`ret*=0;
warp_29=`}
warp_30=`
warp_31=`
warp_32=`}

comp_3=`  ret = tex2D(sampler_main,uv).xyz;

comp_6=`  ret += ret-blr; 
comp_7=`}
